meanings.definition: Moving up and down repeatedly on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The ball was bouncing on the ground.
meanings.sent2: She loves bouncing on the trampoline.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo was bouncing happily in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was bouncing with joy when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bouncing ball stayed in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The children were bouncing with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The puppy had a bouncing personality.
meanings.sent3: The bouncing music made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her bouncing laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The bouncing colors of the painting caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The machine was bouncing out coins.
meanings.sent2: He was bouncing out orders left and right.
meanings.sent3: The toaster started bouncing out toast unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The magician was bouncing out rabbits from his hat.
meanings.sent5: The fountain was bouncing out water in a mesmerizing pattern.
